person.persName: Michael O. Wade (Louisville, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, school trustee, and clerk)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, farmer, merchant, school trustee, and clerk. Virginia native. Married to Mildred A. Cook Wade in Warren County, North Carolina, on June 13, 1837. Married to Martha A. Wells Wade in Bullitt County, Kentucky, on February 17, 1842. Father of Mildred A. Wade, Mary W. Wade, Josiah Wade, and W.W. Wade. Married to Mary Ashby Wade in Louisville, Kentucky, on September 23, 1857. Married to Sallie Hill Wade in Spencer County, Kentucky, on November 29, 1859. Father of Elizabeth Wade. Farmer in Bullitt County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Bullitt County in 1850. Merchant in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Louisville in 1860. School trustee in Louisville in 1861. Clerk in Louisville in 1865.
